statements: SELECT * FROM InvestmentFirm WHERE analyst_count > 10
SELECT firm_name, assets_under_management FROM InvestmentFirm WHERE founded_date > '2010-01-01'
SELECT firm_id, firm_name, analyst_count FROM InvestmentFirm WHERE assets_under_management > 1000000.00
SELECT * FROM InvestmentFirm ORDER BY founded_date DESC
SELECT AVG(assets_under_management) AS average_assets FROM InvestmentFirm
SELECT * FROM InvestmentFirm WHERE assets_under_management > 1000000 ORDER BY founded_date DESC, analyst_count ASC
SELECT firm_name, assets_under_management FROM InvestmentFirm WHERE analyst_count > 5 ORDER BY assets_under_management DESC
SELECT firm_id, firm_name, analyst_count FROM InvestmentFirm WHERE founded_date > '2010-01-01' AND assets_under_management < 5000000 ORDER BY analyst_count DESC
SELECT * FROM InvestmentFirm WHERE analyst_count BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY firm_name ASC
SELECT firm_id, firm_name, assets_under_management FROM InvestmentFirm WHERE founded_date < '2000-01-01' AND assets_under_management > 5000000 ORDER BY assets_under_management DESC, firm_name ASC
SELECT * FROM InvestmentFirms;
SELECT firm_name, firm_location FROM InvestmentFirms WHERE firm_location='New York';
SELECT firm_name, firm_location FROM InvestmentFirms ORDER BY firm_location DESC;
SELECT trend_category, trend_description FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends ORDER BY trend_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM InvestmentFirms ORDER BY firm_name DESC;
SELECT firm_name, firm_location FROM InvestmentFirms WHERE firm_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT trend_category, COUNT(*) FROM MarketTrends GROUP BY trend_category ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM InvestmentFirms JOIN MarketTrends ON InvestmentFirms.firm_id = MarketTrends.trend_id;
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends;
SELECT symbol, trend_score FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_score > 0.5;
SELECT industry, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM MarketTrends GROUP BY industry;
SELECT * FROM RiskAssessments WHERE risk_score < 0.2 ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;

SELECT MarketTrends.symbol, RiskAssessments.risk_score, InvestmentDecisions.decision_date FROM MarketTrends INNER JOIN RiskAssessments ON MarketTrends.market_id = RiskAssessments.market_id INNER JOIN InvestmentDecisions ON RiskAssessments.assessment_id = InvestmentDecisions.assessment_id WHERE InvestmentDecisions.investment_action = 'Buy';
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_score > 0.5 ORDER BY symbol ASC;
SELECT market_id, trend_score, industry FROM MarketTrends WHERE industry = 'Technology' ORDER BY trend_score DESC;

SELECT MarketTrends.symbol, MarketTrends.trend_score, RiskAssessments.risk_score FROM MarketTrends JOIN RiskAssessments ON MarketTrends.market_id = RiskAssessments.market_id WHERE RiskAssessments.risk_score > 0.7;

SELECT MarketTrends.symbol, RiskAssessments.risk_score, InvestmentDecisions.decision_date FROM MarketTrends JOIN RiskAssessments ON MarketTrends.market_id = RiskAssessments.market_id JOIN InvestmentDecisions ON RiskAssessments.assessment_id = InvestmentDecisions.assessment_id WHERE InvestmentDecisions.investment_action = 'Buy' ORDER BY RiskAssessments.risk_score DESC;

SELECT MarketTrends.symbol AS Market_Symbol, RiskAssessments.risk_score AS Risk_Score, InvestmentDecisions.investment_action AS Action FROM MarketTrends JOIN RiskAssessments ON MarketTrends.market_id = RiskAssessments.market_id JOIN InvestmentDecisions ON RiskAssessments.assessment_id = InvestmentDecisions.assessment_id WHERE MarketTrends.symbol LIKE 'AAPL%' AND InvestmentDecisions.investment_action = 'Buy' ORDER BY InvestmentDecisions.decision_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends
SELECT id, trend_name FROM MarketTrends ORDER BY date_recorded DESC
SELECT trend_description FROM MarketTrends WHERE id = 3
SELECT * FROM RiskAssessments WHERE risk_level = 'High'
SELECT * FROM InvestmentDecisions WHERE decision_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, trend_name, trend_description FROM MarketTrends WHERE date_recorded >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM RiskAssessments WHERE assessment_result LIKE '%high%' ORDER BY assessment_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, decision_name, decision_date FROM InvestmentDecisions WHERE decision_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT firm_id, firm_name, industry, location FROM FirmDetails WHERE industry = 'Technology' ORDER BY firm_id;
SELECT * FROM InvestmentFirms;
SELECT firm_name, headquarters_address FROM InvestmentFirms;
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM MarketTrends ORDER BY trend_name ASC;
SELECT firm_name, risk_score FROM InvestmentFirms JOIN RiskAssessments ON InvestmentFirms.firm_id = RiskAssessments.firm_id;
SELECT * FROM InvestmentFirms WHERE founder IS NOT NULL ORDER BY founding_date DESC;
SELECT firm_name, headquarters_address FROM InvestmentFirms WHERE headquarters_address LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM MarketTrends WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT firm_id, SUM(amount) as total_amount FROM InvestmentDecisions GROUP BY firm_id HAVING total_amount > 100000;
SELECT firm_name, risk_score FROM InvestmentFirms JOIN RiskAssessments ON InvestmentFirms.firm_id = RiskAssessments.firm_id WHERE risk_score > 8;
